docs.text: Welcome! Welcome to the personal site of SRK aka Sudalai Rajkumar! I am a data scientist with more than a decade of experience across multiple domains. I was part of H2O.ai, Freshworks, Tiger Analytics and Global Analytics. I have experience building scalable ML / AI products. I have built and lead data science teams in my past roles. I am a 3x Kaggle Grandmaster in competitions, datasets and code categories. I was ranked number one in Analytcs Vidhya datahack platform. I was also regarded as one of the top data scientists in India by Analytics India Magazine and Jigsaw Academy. I did my graduation from PSG college of Technology, Coimbatore and completed my executive course from IIM, Bangalore. I am a community builder and was part of a number of webinars, meetups, conferences. I am a Tedx speaker as well. Social Media Profiles
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Welcome to the personal site of SRK aka Sudalai Rajkumar! I am a data scientist with more than a decade of experience across multiple domains. I was part of H2O.ai, Freshworks, Tiger Analytics and Global Analytics. I have experience building scalable ML / AI products. I have built and lead data science teams in my past roles. I am a 3x Kaggle Grandmaster in competitions, datasets and code categories. I was ranked number one in Analytcs Vidhya datahack platform. I was also regarded as one of the top data scientists in India by Analytics India Magazine and Jigsaw Academy. I did my graduation from PSG college of Technology, Coimbatore and completed my executive course from IIM, Bangalore. I am a community builder and was part of a number of webinars, meetups, conferences. I am a Tedx speaker as well.
